title: WANT TO KNOW WHAT AGES PLAY ON LOL
body: JUST WANT TO KNOW WHAT AGES PLAY ON LOL ?

replies.body:
LMAO im guessing you are in your early teens, when most players are probably around 18-24

an article from last year: "51% of players worldwide are aged 19-25"
http://oyster.ignimgs.com/wordpress/stg.ign.com/2013/10/league_of_legends_infographic_800.jpg
22! Open your mind and make the ranges more accurate next time. LOL my generation grew up gaming.
These age ranges suck. You've got separate entries between 15 and 20, then a 20 year bracket between 20 and 40.

Nobody votes because all of us are not included on the poll.


Seriously though, the original forum only had like monthly 400 visitors or even less, with the change over to Board how many  do you think still actively browse/post here?

Also it's simply not an accurate presentation of the "Age groups that play LoL" since we are talking about prob a sample size of like 50 against the total number of millions to hundreds of millions.

EDIT: And my guess, OP is 15 yo. hue.
